name: Classic Slim Fit Jeans
description: Dark denim slim fit jeans, perfect for a casual or semi-formal look. Made with stretch cotton for added comfort. Ideal for any season.

name: Casual Linen Shirt
description: Light and breathable linen shirt, ideal for warm days. Regular fit design with wooden buttons. Available in various pastel colors.

name: Floral Print Midi Dress
description: Vibrant floral print midi dress, perfect for daytime events or casual outings. Flowy fabric and V-neckline for a comfortable and elegant fit.

name: Faux Leather Jacket
description: Biker style faux leather jacket, with metal zippers and inner lining. A timeless classic that adds an edgy touch to any outfit.

name: Merino Wool Sweater
description: Soft and warm merino wool sweater, ideal for winter. Classic crew neck design that goes with everything. Available in neutral colors.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Basic organic cotton t-shirt, soft to the touch and environmentally friendly. Straight cut and round neck, perfect for everyday wear.

name: Beige Chino Pants
description: Cotton twill chino pants, with a comfortable and modern fit. Versatile for casual or slightly dressier looks. Button and zip closure.

name: Silk Blouse with Ties
description: Elegant silk blouse with tie details at the cuffs. Ideal for special occasions or to add a sophisticated touch at work. Breathable and lightweight.

name: Boho Maxi Dress
description: Bohemian style maxi dress with ruffles and ethnic print. Perfect for summer, festivals, or a beach day. Light and fresh fabric.

name: Waterproof Windbreaker Jacket
description: Ultralight and waterproof windbreaker jacket, ideal for outdoor activities. Folds easily for storage. With adjustable hood.

name: Cashmere V-Neck Sweater
description: High-quality cashmere sweater with a V-neck. Extremely soft and warm, a luxury for cold days. A wardrobe staple.

name: Vintage Graphic T-Shirt
description: Cotton t-shirt with a vintage-style graphic print. Oversized cut for a relaxed and modern look. Ideal for pairing with jeans.

name: Straight Gabardine Pants
description: Straight-cut gabardine pants, ideal for a casual or office look. Comfortable and durable. Front zip and button closure.

name: Classic Oxford Shirt
description: 100% cotton Oxford shirt, a timeless basic for any wardrobe. Regular fit and button-down collar. Perfect for formal or informal looks.

name: Long Evening Dress
description: Long evening dress with lace details and a side slit. Elegant and sophisticated, ideal for formal events and galas. Fully lined.

name: Sherpa Lined Denim Jacket
description: Denim jacket lined with synthetic sherpa, ideal for cold weather. A renewed classic that provides warmth and style to your winter outfits.

name: Oversized Knit Sweater
description: Chunky knit oversized sweater, very comfortable and warm. Ideal for layering with leggings or skinny jeans. High collar for extra warmth.

name: Good Vibes Graphic T-Shirt
description: Cotton t-shirt with a 'Good Vibes' front graphic print in modern typography. Soft and comfortable for daily wear. Unisex fit.

name: Cotton Jogger Pants
description: Cotton jogger pants with elastic waistband and fitted cuffs. Ideal for a sporty look or for comfortable home wear. With side pockets.

name: Plaid Flannel Shirt
description: Soft flannel shirt with a plaid pattern, perfect for a casual fall/winter look. Can be worn open or closed.

name: Denim Shirt Dress
description: Light denim shirt dress with front buttons and adjustable belt. Versatile and comfortable, ideal for a casual chic look. Roll-up sleeves.

name: Black Tailored Blazer
description: Classic tailored blazer in black, with lapel and buttons. Perfect for a formal office look or to elevate a casual outfit. Lined.

name: Long Knit Cardigan
description: Long fine knit cardigan, ideal for layering in any season. Soft and lightweight, perfect for a relaxed and stylish look.

name: Basic V-Neck T-Shirt
description: Cotton V-neck t-shirt, an essential basic for any wardrobe. Soft and comfortable. Available in various solid colors.

name: High Compression Sport Leggings
description: High-waisted, high-compression sport leggings, ideal for training. Breathable and quick-drying fabric. Secret pocket in the waistband.

name: Printed Silk Shirt
description: Silk shirt with a vibrant abstract print. Elegant and fluid, perfect for a night out or a special event. Buttoned cuffs.

name: Linen Short Jumpsuit
description: Short linen jumpsuit with a wrap-over neckline and elastic waist. Fresh and comfortable, ideal for summer. With side pockets.

name: Warm Puffer Jacket
description: Puffer jacket with synthetic filling, very warm and lightweight. Ideal for colder days. With detachable hood and zippered pockets.

name: Handmade Cable Knit Sweater
description: Cable knit sweater with handmade braids, classic and timeless style. Warm and comfortable. Crew neck and ribbed cuffs.

name: Basic Pima Cotton T-Shirt
description: Premium quality Pima cotton t-shirt, exceptionally soft and durable. A luxury for everyday wear. Classic cut and perfect fit.

name: Linen Shorts with Elastic Waist
description: Linen shorts with elastic waistband and adjustable drawstring. Perfect for warm days, very fresh and comfortable. With side pockets.

name: Broderie Bodysuit Shirt
description: Cotton broderie bodysuit shirt with embroidered details. Elegant and romantic, ideal for pairing with high-waisted skirts or pants.

name: Pleated Midi Skirt
description: Pleated midi skirt in satin fabric, with a fluid and elegant movement. Elastic waist for a comfortable fit. Ideal for day or night looks.

name: Classic Wool Coat
description: Long wool coat, straight cut and lapel. An elegant and timeless outerwear for winter. Front buttons and side pockets.

name: Soft Mohair Sweater
description: Mohair sweater, incredibly soft and lightweight, yet very warm. Ideal for a romantic and delicate look. Crew neck.

name: Striped Sailor T-Shirt
description: Cotton t-shirt with classic sailor stripes, crew neck. A versatile basic for any season. French style.

name: Vintage Mom Fit Jeans
description: Mom Fit style jeans with a high waist and relaxed cut. Vintage wash for an authentic and retro look. Perfect for pairing with sneakers.

name: Pure Silk Shirt with Pearls
description: Pure silk shirt with small pearl buttons, a touch of luxury and sophistication. Fluid drape and natural sheen. Ideal for formal events.

name: Palazzo Night Jumpsuit
description: Elegant night jumpsuit with palazzo pants and a deep neckline. Ideal for a party or special event. Soft fabric with good drape.

name: Short Tweed Jacket
description: Short tweed jacket with gold buttons, Chanel style. Elegant and sophisticated, perfect for a classic look or to elevate a casual outfit.

name: Cotton Turtleneck Sweater
description: Soft cotton turtleneck sweater, ideal for mid-season. Comfortable and versatile, an essential basic for layering.

name: Floral Embroidered T-Shirt
description: Cotton t-shirt with delicate floral embroidery on the chest. A feminine and artisanal touch for a basic. Soft and fresh.

name: Denim Culotte Pants
description: Denim culotte pants with a wide cut and ankle length. Modern and comfortable, ideal for a relaxed and stylish look. Mid-rise.

name: Oversized Gabardine Shirt
description: Oversized gabardine shirt, ideal for wearing as an overshirt or as a main garment. Utilitarian and modern style. Front pockets.

name: Sequin Party Dress
description: Short party dress covered in sequins. Shines with every movement, perfect for a night of celebration. Lined for added comfort.

name: Waterproof Raincoat with Hood
description: Lightweight waterproof raincoat with adjustable hood, ideal for rainy days. Classic and versatile style. Easy to pack.

name: Fine Knit Yarn Sweater
description: Fine knit yarn sweater, ideal for transitional weather. Soft and lightweight texture, perfect for wearing alone or under a blazer. Crew neck.

name: Cropped T-Shirt with Knot Detail
description: Cropped t-shirt with a knot detail at the front. Modern and youthful, ideal for pairing with high-waisted pants or skirts.

name: Crepe Palazzo Pants
description: Crepe palazzo pants with a fluid drape, elegant and comfortable. Ideal for a sophisticated day or night look. High waist and side zip closure.

name: Acid Wash Denim Shirt
description: Denim shirt with an acid wash for a vintage effect. Loose fit and snap buttons. A revamped classic for a relaxed style.
